27D09DF0.Line7.53D3D: With a bit of skill, you can learn a lot from someone's innards. Not many remember or practice the old ways, but you split the gut and read the mess that pours out...

59F3316A.Line1.53D3D: Oh, just reading this fellow's entrails.

6EFE157B.Line11.53D3D: The goatmen are encroaching ever more on our lands. I'm trying to determine why, how.

C1C51772.Line9.53D3D: Help me open the gut further, will you? I'm not getting a good reading, and my hands aren't as steady as they used to be.
